question:
Show how the Hell-Volhard-Zelinsky reaction might be used in the synthesis of each of the following compounds, beginning in each case with a simple monocarboxylic acid. Write detailed mechanisms for all the reactions in one of your syntheses.

(a) $HO_2CCH_2SSCH_2CO_2H$

(b) $(CH_3CH_2)_2NCH_2CO_2H$
